TextBlock.Text: Lotus: Now this is something! ...Or on closer inspection, it's more dissapointing than the other objects I've seen around here.
Lotus: Surely this confirms that nothing actually lives here, this structure in particular seems to only serve an aesthetic purpose.
Lotus: Maybe this is equivalent to planting a flag? Plenty of other space-faring species have done the same on far less hospitable planets.
Lotus: Then again, building a whole <color=orange>monolith</color> is more involved than planting a flag -- hold on, what's that down there?
